name: European Hematology Association
goal: The European Hematology Association (EHA) promotes excellence in patient care, research and education in hematology.
interests: Competition, Education and training, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Research funding (Horizon 2020, FP9)
Training & research networks, incl. ERN EuroBloodNet, IMI project HARMONY, Innovative Training Network PROFILE (Marie Curie)
Professional Qualifications Directive
Access to Medicines, pricing
Blood directives (Substances of Human Origin)
